subtitle: A company open to customers, opening the future for customers

solutions.title: From Design to Simulation
desc: Start your journey in logistics automation with OpenSG.
An integrated business system for smooth and rapid decision-making and flexible response to crises
A logistics control system using AGVs, enabling real-time AGV Traffic control
Conveyor equipment control system, enabling intelligent transport commands and various automatic interconnections
Stocker equipment control system, allowing remote monitoring and control
A program for controlling Indexers, responsible for efficient product supply to EQ equipment and logistics return via Stockers
An OHT logistics control system capable of real-time Traffic control for high-speed OHTs
